channel.title: Pipelayer/Welding_pipe Carrier on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Pipelayer/Welding_pipe Carrier on Universal

item.title: E02750
item.description: Pipe carrier kit fitted on Caterpillar D8T Dozer. Pipe saddles can be changed to transport various pipe diameters from 36 to 60 inches. Kit can be easily removed and re-installed on Cat D8T/R tractor. E-rops cab with air-conditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C15 ACERT Technology engine with 359HP (268kW), 3 speed power-shift transmission, joystick controls, New Caterpillar undercarriage fitted, 600mm pads, 35.000Kgs operating weight, front & rear work lights. 4 Kits available from stock.
